Treatment options for cutaneous anaplastic large cell lymphoma may include:            -  Surgery, radiation therapy, or both.           In children, treatment options for mycosis fungoides may include:            - Steroids applied to the skin.     - Retinoid therapy.     - Radiation therapy.     -  Phototherapy (light therapy using ultraviolet B radiation).",CancerGov,Childhood Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma
